midas/examples/experiment/scaler.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         scaler.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Contents:     Example scaler analyzer module. This module looks
00007                 for a SCLR banks and accumulates scalers into an
00008                 ACUM bank.
00009 
00010   $Log: scaler.c,v $
00011   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:11  mucap
00012   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00013   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00014 
00015   Revision 1.5  2004/01/08 08:40:08  midas
00016   Implemented standard indentation
00017

00019   add required #include <string.h>
00020

00022   Removed printf("EOR scaler\n");

00029 
00030 /*-- Include files -------------------------------------------------*/
00031 
00032 /* standard includes */
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 #include <time.h>
00036 
00037 /* midas includes */
00038 #include "midas.h"
00039 #include "experim.h"
00040 #include "analyzer.h"
00041 
00042 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00043 
00044 INT scaler_accum(EVENT_HEADER *, void *);
00045 INT scaler_clear(INT run_number);
00046 INT scaler_eor(INT run_number);
00047 
00048 ANA_MODULE scaler_accum_module = {
00049    "Scaler accumulation",       /* module name           */
00050    "Stefan Ritt",               /* author                */
00051    scaler_accum,                /* event routine         */
00052    scaler_clear,                /* BOR routine           */
00053    scaler_eor,                  /* EOR routine           */
00054    NULL,                        /* init routine          */
00055    NULL,                        /* exit routine          */
00056    NULL,                        /* parameter structure   */
00057    0,                           /* structure size        */
00058    NULL,                        /* initial parameters    */
00059 };
00060 
00061 /*-- accumulated scalers -------------------------------------------*/
00062 
00063 double scaler[32];
00064 
00065 /*-- BOR routine ---------------------------------------------------*/
00066 
00067 INT scaler_clear(INT run_number)
00068 {
00069    memset(scaler, 0, sizeof(scaler));
00070    return SUCCESS;
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*-- EOR routine ---------------------------------------------------*/
00074 
00075 INT scaler_eor(INT run_number)
00076 {
00077    return SUCCESS;
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00081 
00082 INT scaler_accum(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00083 {
00084    INT n, i;
00085    DWORD *psclr;
00086    double *pacum;
00087 
00088    /* look for SCLR bank */
00089    n = bk_locate(pevent, "SCLR", &psclr);
00090    if (n == 0)
00091       return 1;
00092 
00093    /* create acummulated scaler bank */
00094    bk_create(pevent, "ACUM", TID_DOUBLE, &pacum);
00095 
00096    /* accumulate scalers */
00097    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00098       scaler[i] += psclr[i];
00099       pacum[i] = scaler[i];
00100    }
00101 
00102    /* close bank */
00103    bk_close(pevent, pacum + n);
00104 
00105    return SUCCESS;
00106 }
